attributes.action: not make Britain apologise for the slave trade
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is no one alive today who was involved in the trading of slaves,even though it was a horrible part in our history we should not be made to say sorry, it is a bit like asking Italy to apologise about the Romans invading Britain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
